sentence.Network_en: His resignation was a body blow to the team.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的辞职是对该队的沉重打击。

sentence.Network_en: There was no grief in his expression, only deep resignation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的表情里没有悲痛，只有深深的无奈。

sentence.Network_en: In the union office, the mood gradually changed from resignation to rage.
sentence.Network_cn: 在工会办公室，情绪慢慢从顺从转变成愤怒。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根及词缀 ... affiliation n 入会，加入 resignation n 辞职；听从 lucubration n 刻苦研究.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... significant a 有意义的 resignation n 辞职；听天由命 similar a 同样的；相似的.
考博英语词汇 ... resign v. 辞去；辞职；顺从；听从 resignation n. 辞职；辞呈；听从；屈从 resin n. 树脂；松香.
-tion后缀 ... designation 指示, 指定, 选派, 名称 resignation 辞职(书),放弃,顺从 ratiocination 推理, 推论.

list.abs: 裸辞（naked resignation），指白领一族还没找好下家就辞职的现象。裸辞的原因多为长期缺乏工作幸福感，或对工作未来的迷失感 …
neurotic personality 神经质人格neurotic resignation 神经型退避neurotic solution 神经质解脱
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... resign oneself to 听凭于 resign to 托付给 resign 辞去.
四级常用固定搭配 ... ... 207、report to 报导，报告 208、resign to 辞职，辞去，放弃；托付给 209、resort to 求助；诉诸于，采取， …
dynamic psychology 动力心理学dynamic resignation 主动型退避dynamic roadway displays 动态路面显示器

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from medieval Latin resignatio(n-), from resignare 'unseal, cancel' (see resign)

entry.def: Your resignation is a formal statement of your intention to leave a job or position.

example.ex: Mr Morgan has offered his resignation and it has been accepted.
example.tran: 摩根先生己经递交了辞呈，并已获准。

entry.tran: 屈从;顺从;听任;勉强接受
entry.def: Resignation is the acceptance of an unpleasant situation or fact because you realize that you cannot change it.

example.ex: There was no grief in his expression, only deep resignation...
example.tran: 他的表情里没有悲痛，只有深深的无奈。
他极其无奈地叹了一口气。

means.word_mean: 2. the act of giving up (a claim or office or possession etc.)
3. a formal document giving notice of your intention to resign;

sentences.sentence: "he submitted his resignation as of next month"

auth_sentence.content: He has repeatedly called for Mr Saleh's resignation.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has repeatedly called for Mr Saleh's resignation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has repeatedly called for Mr Saleh's resignation.

auth_sentence.content: I attach below my resignation letter to Rupert Murdoch.
auth_sentence.res_content: I attach below my resignation letter to Rupert Murdoch.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I attach below my resignation letter to Rupert Murdoch.

auth_sentence.content: The resignation ends the socialist government's six-year reign.
auth_sentence.res_content: The resignation ends the socialist government's six-year reign.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The resignation ends the socialist government's six-year reign.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =mark,表示"记号,信号,标志"; 2. 签署

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有意义的;重大的,重要的
stems_affixes.word_buile: significance[[n.意义,含义;重要性,重要的]]→adj.有意义的;重大的,重要的
in内部+sign记号,信号,标志+ia状态→内部标志

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分配,指派;[指定的]作业,[分派的]任务
stems_affixes.word_buile: assign派给,分配+ment表名词→n.分配,指派;[指定的]作业,[分派的]任务
consign[v.托运,托人看管]+ment表名词→n.托运,寄售
de加强+sign记号→做好记号→设计
designate[v.指明,指出;任命,指派]+ion表名词→designation指定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 旗, 军舰旗, 军旗, 徽章,舰旗[船上表示所属国家的旗帜]
stems_affixes.word_buile: en内部+sign记号,信号,标志→内部标志
resign[v.辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从]+ation表名词→n.放弃,辞职,反抗
sign记号,信号,标志→n.符号；手势；征兆，迹象 v. 签名；作手势
sign记号,信号,标志+al→n.信号,暗号 v.发信号,用信号通知
sign记号,信号,标志+ature表名词→记号的东西→签名
sign记号,信号,标志+et做记号→图章

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意义,含义;重要性,重要的
stems_affixes.word_buile: signifi=signify[v.表示,意味;要紧,有重要性]+cance→n.意义,含义;重要性,重要的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 派给,分配;选定,指定[时间,地点等]
stems_affixes.word_buile: as加强+sign签署→指定
de加强+sign记号→做好记号→设计
de加强+sign记号+ate表动词→指定记号→指定,指明
con共同+sign记号,信号,标志→共同做记号→把……委托给别人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+sign签署→v.辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从
sign记号,信号,标志→n.符号；手势；征兆，迹象 v. 签名；作手势
sign记号,信号,标志+al→n.信号,暗号 v.发信号,用信号通知

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使著名, 使显著, 使显眼, 向……发信号
stems_affixes.word_buile: signal信号+ize表动词→发信号
sign记号,信号,标志+et做记号→图章

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表示,意味;要紧,有重要性
stems_affixes.word_buile: sign记号,信号,标志+ify……化→用信号表示→象征

Sentence.sentence: I think your boss would be very upset when he gets your letter of resignation.

sentences.en: His resignation left a vacancy on the board of directors.
sentences.cn: 他的辞职给董事会留下了一个空缺。

sentences.en: They handed their resignations to the manager.
sentences.cn: 他们将辞呈交给了经理。

sentences.en: She bore the pain with resignation.
